name: Fortinet FortiAP操作系统命令注入漏洞
product: ["Fortinet FortiAP >=7.4.0\uff0c<=7.4.2", "Fortinet FortiAP >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.3", "Fortinet FortiAP 7.0.x", "Fortinet FortiAP 6.4.x", "Fortinet FortiAP-S >=6.4.0\uff0c<=6.4.9", "Fortinet FortiAP-S 6.2.x", "Fortinet FortiAP-W >=7.4.0\uff0c<=7.4.2", "Fortinet FortiAP-W >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.3", "Fortinet FortiAP-W 7.0.x", "Fortinet FortiAP-W 6.4.x"]
description: Fortinet FortiAP是美国飞塔（Fortinet）公司的一款用于管理无线接入点设备的控制器。Fortinet FortiAP存在操作系统命令注入漏洞，该漏洞源于操作系统命令中使用的特殊元素的不当中和，攻击者可利用该漏洞通过CLI执行未经授权的代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-23-405
patch: Fortinet FortiAP操作系统命令注入漏洞的补丁
